collections.title: Featured
collections.description: Our latest releases and most popular items!

items.name: High Tide - Rave Festival
items.shortDesc: Get tickets for our massive rave festival on May 25!

variants.name: default
variants.description: Register for High Tide - the premier rave festival happening at UC San Diego!

items.name: Membership Cards
items.shortDesc: Get exclusive perks and discounts across campus!

variants.name: Spring (current)
variants.description: Get a membership card to score exclusive discounts and perks this season! Perks include: 10% off at most restaurants on-campus, 10% off all Club Merch, and Priority for Fursuit Workshops.

variants.name: Winter 2025
variants.description: Missed our previous membership card? No worries! You can still get this previous card and keep the art as a souvenir, and show your support for the club. (The card will not be valid for discounts.)

collections.title: The Beach Vibes Collection
collections.description: Catch the waves with our mascot -- Tide the Raccoon!

variants.name: default
variants.description: Ride the waves in style with our San Diego Beach Tee! Featuring Tide the Raccoon, this shirt is perfect for sunny days and coastal vibes.

variants.name: default
variants.description: Add a splash of tropical vibes to your collection with this vibrant Tropical Drink Sticker, featuring a refreshing design perfect for summer!

variants.name: default
variants.description: Show your love for Tide the Raccoon with this adorable Tide Sticker, a must-have for fans of our beach mascot!

variants.name: default
variants.description: A quirky and fun sticker to add to your collection lol. It's best not to ask too many questions.

collections.title: The High Tide Collection
collections.description: Shop our exclusive collabs with our friends at FurFlux!

variants.name: default
variants.description: Show off your festival spirit with this vibrant High Tide Kandi Bracelet! Handcrafted with love, it's the perfect accessory for any rave enthusiast.

variants.name: default
variants.description: Deck out your gear with the High Tide Sticker Pack! Featuring exclusive designs, these stickers are a must-have for fans of the festival.

variants.name: default
variants.description: Ride the wave of style with the High Tide x FurFlux Tee! This comfy shirt is perfect for showing your love for the ultimate collab.

variants.name: default
variants.description: Stay cozy and cool with the High Tide x FurFlux Hoodie! Perfect for chilly nights, this hoodie combines comfort and festival vibes.

collections.title: The Wolf Sanctuary Collection
collections.description: Awoo! Proceeds go toward supporting the California Wolf Center, to help save endangered wolf populations in the U.S.

collections.title: The Fursuit Workshop Collection
collections.description: Get materials and learn to make your own fursuit at our workshops!
